Uses of Interface
energy.usef.core.event.ExpirableEvent

  • Packages that use ExpirableEvent 
    Package Description
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.goals
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI goals of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.nonudi.initialize
    Workflow classes for Non-UDI initialization of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.deviation
    Package containing the java components needed for the 'AGR Detect deviations from Prognoses' workflow.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.recreate.prognoses
    Classes for (re-)creation of prognoses in the operate phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.operate.reoptimize
    Package to contain workflow logic around Determining Net Demands
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.connection.profile
    Workflow classes for connection profiles in the plan phase of the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.create.aplan
    Classes for creation of A-plans in the plan phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.plan.recreate.aplan
    Classes for creation of A-plans in the plan phase by the Aggregator.
    energy.usef.agr.workflow.validate.create.dprognosis
    Package containing the java components needed for the 'Create and Send D-Prognosis' workflow.
    energy.usef.brp.workflow.plan.connection.forecast
    Connection forecast classes of the Balance Responsible Party.
    energy.usef.core.event
    This package contains the core Events which are related to the planboard (cross-role).
    energy.usef.core.event.validation  
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.coloring
    Classes to implement regime transitions (green/yellow/orange/red) for the DSO.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.validate.create.flexrequest
    This package contains the components needed for the implementation of the 'Create Flex Requests' DSO workflow.
    energy.usef.dso.workflow.validate.gridsafetyanalysis
    Grid safety analysis classes of the Distribution System Operator.
